name: The 8th Int'l Conference on Catalysis
content: Important NOTE: Due to COVID-19 epidemic situation all over the world, most countries still maintain a strict policy of no-gathering, no-entering and leaving the country, and 14-days quarantine. We have to postpone the conference till July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. The 8th Int'l Conference on Catalysis (ICC 2021) Conference Date: July 16-18, 2021 Conference Venue: Kunming, China Website: https://www.confjuly.org/conference/ICC2021/ Online Registration System: http://www.confjuly.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1360 Email: intelconf@163.com The 8th Int'l Conference on Catalysis (ICC 2021) will be held from July 16-18, 2021 in Kunming, China. ICC 2021 will cover issues on Catalysis Technology Innovation, Catalyst Design, Catalyst Preparation & Characterization, Electrocatalysis, Nanocatalysis, Small Molecules Catalysis, Structured Catalyst, Theoretical Modeling of Catalytic Reactions, etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
